cn.title: 关于支持 Oasis Network（ROSE）网络升级的公告

message.data: 据 Oasis Network（ROSE）官方消息，Oasis Network 将于网络8,049出块时期（预计香港时间2021年09月01日00:00）进行网络升级。
比特派会支持此次升级，为保护广大用户的资产安全，比特派将于2021年8月31日下午21:00（香港时间）暂停 ROSE 收发、节点投票等业务，请您提前做好规划。
相关服务将在升级稳定后第一时间恢复，感谢您对比特派 Bitpie 的支持。

en.title: Announcement on Oasis Network (ROSE) network upgrade

message.data: The Oasis Network (ROSE) network upgrade will take place at epoch 8,049, approximately at 2021-08-31 16:00 (UTC).

Bitpie will support the upgrade, during the upgrade, Bitpie will limit the ROSE send and receive function in the APP at 13:00 on 31/08/2021 (UTC) in order to protect your assets. Please avoid sending and receiving ROSE during this period.
The related functions will be restored ASAP after the Oasis Network blockchain is stable .
Thank you for your support to Bitpie.
